name: Fight desserts
description: This is just another way of fighting life. Too many annoying things are full of life. But we can still eat a dessert to show our standpoint to life. Sweet food What a wonderful thing. It tempts us, Consumes our wallet, at the same time, Brings us happiness and weight gain. But you have a gun ...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp/vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
